divs: Sighting Details1 - sitting at my garage door facing east smokin a cigarette2 - im alwayslooking at the sky...noticed the pulsating moving lights3 - no clue..ive seenaircraft, satellites, etc. these light had resemblence4 - calm duringobservation, reserved excitement after immediatly going inside and informingmy wife.5 - 4 loosely grouped (within a quarter held at arms length) pulsatinglights pulsated independently and surged forward independantly with eachpulse (leapfrog no discernable pattern). first observed 80 deg overhead toapprox 45 deg above horizon travelling NW -3E SE taking approx 5-10 seconds to cover that arc with each object pulsing4-5 times.6 - lost sighting because of neighbors housesighting occured inOctober of either 1998 or 1999 10:00 pm CDT (i was waitin for 10pm news)
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Houma
There were no other sightings in Houma on or around September 30th 1999
